response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which holds immense value for you at $15,000. I am confident it will significantly benefit your endeavors. Considering its worth and the benefits it offers, I propose to sell it to you for $12,000. This price not only ensures a fair deal but also allows you to acquire an asset that could potentially be worth much more in the future. I look forward to your positive response. Kind regards, Alice", "product_price": 12000}
